titleStmt.title: A proclamation for the speedy calling of a Parliament James R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the Heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: "By the King."
At end of text: "Given at our court at Whitehall the 30th day of November, 1688."
